snippet.title: catering Restaurants in san francisco, ca
snippet.description: LATEST REVIEW Authentic Southern BBQ is hard to find on the West Coast, but Nate's recipe fits the bill. Stone Korean Kitchen Asian, Korean, Casual/Family, Catering 4 Embarcadero Ctr, San Francisco 415 839-4070. LATEST REVIEW We eat in this restaurant about once a week.

snippet.title: OpenTable Reviews \- Miss Pearl's Restaurant & Lounge Reviews \- Rated by OpenTable Diners
snippet.description: Miss Pearl's Restaurant & Lounge Reviews List. After our flood we decided to take the time to remodel our beautiful restaurant here in the heart of Historic Jack London Square in Oakland, in a stunning waterfront setting with sweeping views of San Francisco and the Oakland-Alameda Estuary.

snippet.title: San Bruno Korean BBQ Restaurant Review, San Bruno - San Bruno Korean BBQ, San Bruno - Foodnut.com
snippet.description: We've passed by this location many times and read the Yelp reviews, so we finally decided it was time to give it a try. Our favorite Korean restaurants in the San Francisco Bay Area include Gooyi Gooyi, Sahn Maru.
